entry.title: What the heck is activityOverlord and why should I care?
entry.content: activityOverlord is a project I’m building to learn sails.js. The application currently has authentication, rights management, real-time presence, activity logging, and much more. This video is a brief look at the partially completed app.

entry.title: Creating a restful json api in less than 15 seconds using sails.js
entry.content: In a very short amount of time I was able to create a powerful api that I can use to immediately feed my front-in application.

entry.title: The Prequels to Sails.js
entry.content:
The Prequel videos are not about sails specifically but instead cover aspects of node.js and its related ecosystem that I found relevant to understanding sails itself.

The Prequel to Sails.js and Node – Part 1: Understanding and creating a node-based HTTP server.

The Prequel to Sails.js and Node – Part 2: Creating a module and parsing a URL in node.js.

The Prequel to Sails.js and Node – Part 3: Creating a router and controller from scratch.
